name: Root Of Evil VR
description:
A VR Game made by the team at Red Inc Games.

Root Of Evil, is a game about a journalist who is being targeted by the notorious "Nightsnatcher", who stalks their pray at night, to counter this, you must stay awake all night and sleep during the day but before you can sleep at 6am you must complete all your tasks.

Use the lights at the front or the side of the house corrisponding to the motion alerts.

Beware of power cosumption, using to much power may cause you to lose all power and/or have power trips.

Dont miss an encounter.

Controls - 

Left Joystick - Movement 

Right Joystick - Snap turn - 45 Degrees

Grip - Grab/Interact

*No Save Games, played in 1 sitting*

Tested on Oculus, waiting for testing on other Headsets.

-About Red Inc Games-

Karl founded Red Inc Games in 2018 to work on assets for other games on the marketplace but wanted to learn more about Unreal Engine and so Karl went into make games using VR and Non-VR. Karl turned 16 in 2020. 

*STEAM VR REQUIRED FOR NON-OCULUS HMD*

*If there is any issues let me know in the comments, I'll try and get back to all of them*
